title: Cross-section of a Plant Stem
description: The image shows a cross-section of a green plant stem, highlighting its internal structure. The stem is depicted in a circular view, revealing various layers such as the epidermis, cortex, and vascular bundles. The vascular bundles are shown in red and green, indicating the xylem and phloem, which are responsible for water and nutrient transport.

title: Leaf and Chloroplast
description: An illustration showing a green leaf with a close-up of a chloroplast. The leaf is depicted in a realistic style, showcasing its veins and texture, while the inset image of the chloroplast highlights its oval shape and structure within a plant cell.

title: Illustration of a Plant
description: An illustration of a young plant with green leaves and a visible root system. The plant is depicted growing in dark soil, showcasing its roots extending into the ground.

title: Simple Geometric Shape
description: A minimalist design featuring a white line forming a right angle on a black background.

title: Root Structure
description: An illustration of a root system, showing a main root with several smaller lateral roots extending from it, all set against a dark background that represents soil.
